translations: 毁坏后的残迹；劫掠后的残迹；破坏的结果（ravage 的复数）
破坏（ravage 的第三人称单数形式）；毁坏

sentences.sentence: Her looks had not survived the ravages of time.
sentences.translation: 她的容颜未能幸免于时间的摧残。

sentences.sentence: On Mondays, eight servants, including an extra gardener, toiled all day with scrubbing-brushes and hammer and garden-shears, repairing the ravages of the night before.
sentences.translation: 每到星期一，有八个仆人，包括一个额外的园丁，用硬毛刷、锤子和花园剪刀干了一整天，修补前一天晚上的破坏。

sentences.sentence: Only this kind of fundamental reform will cure the ravages of inflation.
sentences.translation: 唯有这样的根本性变革才会治愈通货膨胀之害。
